name: Fellowship (BoyoRadio)
description:
A immersive town made with Unity and free assets from the Unity Store as well as free character models and animations from Mixamo. The dialogue features are from the Dialogue System for Unity by Pixel Crushers for the UI, Quest, and Dialogue.

Using ideas like agency and immersion to bring out an adventure through the village.

The story is you are placed in a village that has come to peace after a war that was fought between the village and a neighboring one. It is your job for the day to help Eve, the village guide, with any favors the citizens have for you.

In the game: 

  • To move: WASD
  • To look around: Use Mouse
  • To bring up Quest Log: J
  • To interact with characters: Space
  • You can interact with some of the doors of the house in the village.

In order to play game: Download .zip file and extract. Then open the Fellowship.exe to play.

(Sorry no sound for the game at the moment.)
